item.title: Autism rate in siblings reduced 4X by vitamin D: 5,000 IU during pregnancy, 1,000 IU to infants
item.description:
• Autism: Will vitamin D supplementation during pregnancy and early childhood reduce the recurrence rate of autism in newborn siblings?
      • Background
      • Methods
      • Results
      • Discussion
      • Conclusions
      • Summary by VitaminDWiki
      • See also VitaminDWiki
      • 158 studies cited this study as of Dec 2024

Autism: Will vitamin D supplementation during pregnancy and early childhood reduce the recurrence rate of autism in newborn siblings?

Medical Hypotheses, Available online 2 February 2016, doi:10.1016/j.mehy.2016.01.015

G. Stubbs, K. Henley, J. Green
